name: Nine Lives
description: A game about a cat, who can acquire flight and laser eyes. All pixel art (except the main cat) also done by me. WIP!

name: The Ruby Mouser
description: A game created to try Phaser 3 and learn more about TypeScript and animating pixel art. All pixel art also done by me. WIP!

name: Zendesk Chat Gatsby Plugin
description: A plugin to easily add Zendesk live chat to a Gatsby website. My first OSS package.

name: Antediluvian
description: Weird fiction magazine in the vein of the pulps of yore. I also help edit and publish the magazine, and write for it.

name: Stravisualizer
description: Data visualizer and GraphQL server wrapper for Strava API. Requires a Strava account to check it out.

name: Awesome Axes
description: A code challenge created for a job application screening, where the challenge was to create with React an image carousel (home page) and multi-image gallery (individual guitar pages) without using any libraries, on whatever topic desired. I picked guitars!

name: Grinning Moon Zine Library
description: A library of scanned zines. NSFW, you've been warned!
